::Nemesis Enforcer/DevilDuer::

Nemesis Enforcer looks over at the scanners, noticing that a ship had landed 
(Ravage's). He taps his comm-link, trying to think of the most reliable 
member to send to recruit the new bot.

"Devil," he finally says into the device, "A new bot has landed. Go check it 
out," he finishes the message, sending the coordiates.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer looks at Perndabot, taking a step back. "Duty calls. Nemesis is in 
charge for now."

With that he turns around, and runs toward the coordinates, eager to go fast 
in case Perndabot was mad.
